skills.skill: .NET WCF and Web Api RESTful web services

duties_responsibilities.duty: Translate application storyboards and use cases into functional applications.
Write clean, scalable code using .NET programming languages.
Review and develop necessary API scripts that add enhancements to CSO applications.
Provide status reporting to the client including status review meetings.
Responsible for functional understanding of existing systems and preparing to come out with the most suitable approach after going through various scenarios.
Responsible for the testing and integration of developed modules.

education_certification.credential: BS in Computer Science or relevant experience.
